resources.string:
1. You have 10 questions to answer.
 2. The questions are in a MCQ format in which 1 out of 4 options is correct.
 3. There is no time limit to answer.
 4. It is mandatory to answer all the questions.
 5. Hit the finish button at the 10th question to see your score.
 6. Lock your Screen Rotation to Portrait Mode.

Congratulations!

 You have completed the Quiz.
 Your Details are as below:
